lines.text: Just a little bit of sauce and Dana can become quite the cynic.
I am not a cynic, Frank! I like to think of myself as a nasty bitch.
We also got a call from the white witch.
Yes, lovely Dana. She knows the location... it's an old hotel on the California coast.
You are in great danger - do not go near the fireplace.
Your husband was a despicable greedy bastard.
I'm the master, and you're the puppet!
I had this dream and I came here to make sure it didn't come true
I'm tired of experimenting with silly puppets.
Fuck you, you Ivy League tight ass.
